attributes.action: Call for an urgent and Immediate General Election.
attributes.additional_details: The country had been thrown into extreme unrest. We need a political party leader that everyone can trust and a political party to lead us through this testing time.  The Conservative party have been using its people as pawns to further careers and line pockets.  We need a general election immediately.
attributes.background: We have been involved in one of the biggest scandals of our time with the EU debate. Cameron has stepped down and Nigel Farage seems to be assisting the Conservative party.  The lies about the EU money going to the NHS are just the tip of the iceberg.
